name: DEFENDER 3D
description: The 80s classic side-scroller meets the modern PC Gamer.. DEFENDER 3D lets you choose a spaceship to suit your play style and blast your way through ever increasing waves of alien invaders and bosses. A quick and easy learning curve with seriously addictive gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core 2 Duo or equivelent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 gig Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 gig Storage: 250 MB available space
